posts.content:
Took my bus over to Nige Collier to get it finally valued this morning. Had a very pleasant drive to Nigeâ€™s place in the beautiful Peak District and was extremely impressed with the thoroughness he applied to valuing the bus.

This really is an in depth service provided by SSVC and much appreciated.

Thanks Nige - a true gent and a pleasure to meet you.

Cheers

Jonny
